pageProps.title: Photography learning roadmap and recommended top 5 courses for Photography.
pageProps.metaDesc:
The amount of time it takes to learn photography depends on several factors, such as your level of commitment, the amount of time you can dedicate to practice, and your goals in photography.
Learning the basics of photography, such as understanding the exposure triangle (aperture, shutter speed, and ISO), composition, and lighting, can take anywhere from a few weeks to a few months. However, becoming proficient in these areas and developing your own style may take years of practice and experimentation.Here’s a learning roadmap that you can follow to develop your photography skills:
